title: House of Rep vs Senate procedures

content.question: Which of the following is an accurate comparison of procedures in the House of Representatives and procedures in the Senate?

choices.label: House of RepresentativesSenateThe Rules Committee decides how long debate will be on most bills.The minority can use the filibuster to defeat a bill.
House of RepresentativesSenateThe House approves revenue bills passed by the Senate first.The Senate operates with less formality than the House.
House of RepresentativesSenateThe House passes articles of impeachment against a president or member of the federal courts.The Senate initiates all bills that deal with the federal budget.
House of RepresentativesSenateThe Speaker of the House is the most powerful member of the chamber.The minority leader is the most powerful member of the chamber.

content.answer: House of RepresentativesSenateThe Rules Committee decides how long debate will be on most bills.The minority can use the filibuster to defeat a bill.

topic.text: 2.2: Structures, Powers, and Functions of Congress

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
